name: Pawly
description: A React app with login & search functionality. Cooperated closely with a UX/UI team using a Figma prototype. Awarded best web dev project at Ironhack graduate show.

name: Iron-Cream
description: A CRUD application that displays a user-generated map and lets the user add, save, comment, and favourite ice cream stores based on data from Google APIs (Maps, Search Box, Places).

name: walk your dog
description: A browser-based single-user game application utilising the p5.js animation library.
